traits.name: Beast Hunter
traits.desc: The elvish veteran archer has advantage on Wisdom (Survival) checks to track beasts and on Intelligence (Nature) checks to recall information about beasts.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.desc: The elvish veteran archer has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put the elvish archer to sleep.

traits.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
traits.desc: The elvish veteran archer has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The elvish veteran archer's weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Stealthy Traveler
traits.desc: The elvish veteran archer can use Stealth while traveling at a normal pace.

traits.name: Surprise Attack
traits.desc: If the elvish veteran archer surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) damage from the attack.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The elvish veteran archer makes two melee attacks or three ranged attacks.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Volley (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: The elvish archer makes one ranged attack against every enemy within 10 feet of a point it can see.
